channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water running down a path and into properties on Sur Charles Irving Close, 17th April
item.description:
The path between Bournside School and Sir Charles Irving Close has been running with water, recently, causing residents at number 5 to have to create sand bags to prevent it entering their house. They suspect could be a problem with blocked drains. I think this has been reported to GCC but it could be that this path is owned by CBC. Advice on the best course of action would be appreciated. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Sir Charles Irving Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sytreet light permanently out, 17th April
item.description:
Street lights not been working for several weeks outside 44,46,48 Shurdington Road. It is a security concern as very dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Shurdington Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire road surface very pitted - like driving offroad, 16th April
item.description:
In Sandford Mill Road just before westbound traffic joins Old Bath Road, the entire surface is so pitted that it's like driving offroad. As this is the A40 it's a heavily used route and it can be dangerous when acceleration is slower than expected as you turn onto Old Bath Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Mill Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lenghty pothole in middle of southbound carriageway outside Coop, 16th April
item.description:
Southbound carriageway outside Bath Road Coop. Has been there for some time. Seems to be an entire strip of road surface that is disappearing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole by bus stop, 16th April
item.description:
This pothole has been present for many months now. Although it may not be deemed “large enough” to be a priority, it is causing a nuisance as vehicles reverberate when passing over it. Water also gathers in it causing a hazard in the road. Please address this issue instead of continually monitoring it until it is finally deemed big enough to fix!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Birdlip, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and rubbish dumped on pavement Russell street outside house No 4, 16th April
item.description:
Mattress and rubbish dumped on pavement Russell Street outside house No 4 Ca you please send somebody to pick it up. Thank you.

item.title: Road flooded caused by brook being blocked, 16th April
item.description:
The brook should drain away down to the canal but doesn’t - the brook is blocked somewhere resulting in sustained closure of Blacksmiths Lane unnecessarily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmith Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 16th April
item.description:
There are a number of potholes here. You have highlighted one with white paint- but when you visited the bins were out - which would have covered them. Please check again - there are lots of patches/holes where the tarmac is breaking up and one that is quite big. It would be good if you can sort this out. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Larkhay Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Public trees overhanging back garden, 16th April
item.description:
Hello, there are a few trees overhanging our back garden from the public footpath along side our house. We have contacted Cheltenham borougg council who have advised these are property of Gloucester city council. They filled our garden with leaves and have caused a significant amount of flys to be pestering the garden. Please can these be cut back to stop the overhang into our garden. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Dewberry Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
